field_descriptions.token: The token used for this land. You pay taxes in this token.
field_descriptions.stake: Your deposited funds. Taxes are paid from this. When it runs out, your land gets nuked!
field_descriptions.sell_price: The price others must pay to buy your land. Higher price = higher taxes.
field_descriptions.income: What you earn per hour from neighboring lands paying taxes to you.
field_descriptions.outgoing: What you pay per hour in taxes to your neighbors.
field_descriptions.earnings: Your net profit or loss per hour (income minus outgoing costs).
field_descriptions.nuke: Time until your land explodes if stake runs out. Add more stake to extend this!

tax_field_descriptions.neighbors_slider: Adjust this to simulate different neighbor scenarios. More neighbors = more taxes you pay, but also more potential income!
tax_field_descriptions.net_yield: Your hourly profit or loss. Green means you're earning more than you're paying in taxes. Red means you're losing money!
tax_field_descriptions.payback_time: How long until your yield covers the land purchase cost. Shorter is better!
tax_field_descriptions.nuke_time: How long your stake will last before running out. When it hits zero, your land gets nuked!
tax_field_descriptions.sell_profit: What you'll receive if someone buys your land (minus the 5% fee). Compare this to what you paid!

steps.text:
Welcome to PonziLand!

PonziLand is a token-agnostic game where you stake tokens on land to earn from your neighbors - but watch out, they earn from you too!

This tutorial is a sandbox with fake tokens to help you learn the mechanics risk-free.
I'm Lazi, and I'll be your guide. Let's learn the basics together!
That highlighted land is owned by a player. Click on it to see its details.

This info panel shows everything about the land.

Hover over each field to learn what it means!
Want more details? Click the eye icon to switch to Pro Mode!
Pro Mode shows the full token breakdown - see exactly where your earnings come from each neighbor!
Now let's buy a land! Click the BUY LAND button to open the purchase menu.
steps.continue: Click on the BUY LAND button

steps.text:
Here you configure your land purchase!

Sell Price: What others pay to buy your land. Higher price = higher taxes you pay.

Stake: Your fuel to pay taxes. More stake = longer survival time.
Want to see how these settings affect your survival? Click on Neighborhood Tax Impact to expand it!

This panel shows how your land will perform!

Hover over each section to learn what it means. When ready, click Buy Now!

Nice! You now own a land!

See that construction site? That's an auction - another way to get land. Click on it!

Auction prices start high and decrease over time.

Buy before it gets too cheap - or someone else will grab it!
You can see how long each land has before it gets nuked! Hover on the top bar and click the shield icon.

Uh oh! Your land's stake is running low and it will be nuked soon!

Open the info panel to add more stake.
Use Increase Stake to add more funds. This extends how long your land survives!
Look! A neighbor's land is about to be nuked! Click the golden coin above your land to claim your taxes - this will trigger the neighbor's nuke!

You've got the basics! Remember:

- Set prices to stay profitable
- Keep your stake topped up
- Watch for cheap auctions
- Claim nuked lands for rewards!

Good luck in PonziLand!
